GE-IDENTIFIER-LENGTH: {{path}}: Invalid identifier `{{value}}`, length must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters (inclusive)
GE-IDENTIFIER-CHARS: {{path}}: Invalid identifier `{{value}}`, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores, and must not start with a digit
GE-ENUM-EMPTY: {{path}}: Invalid enum definition, at least one entry is required
GE-FLOAT-MIN: {{path}}: Invalid float validation config, value for `min` must be a finite float
GE-FLOAT-MAX: {{path}}: Invalid float validation config, value for `max` must be a finite float
GE-FLOAT-NORANGE: {{path}}: Invalid float validation config, range has no valid values
GE-FLOAT-WMIN: {{path}}: Redundant float validation config, inclusive `min` matches the minimum allowed value
GE-FLOAT-WMAX: {{path}}: Redundant float validation config, inclusive `max` matches the maximum allowed value
GE-FLOAT-WONE: {{path}}: Float validation config only restricts to a single value ({{value}})
GE-FLOAT-INFINITE: {{path}}: Value can't be represented using a finite 64-bit floating point number
GE-FUZZYDATETIME-JSON: {{path}}: Invalid type, expected Int (fuzzy date time)
GE-FUZZYDATETIME-PRECISION: {{path}}: Fuzzy date time {{value}} uses precision-encoding value (for {{precision}}), which is not allowed here
GE-FUZZYDATE-PRECISION: {{path}}: Fuzzy date {{value}} uses precision-encoding value (for {{precision}}), which is not allowed here
GE-FUZZYTIME-PRECISION: {{path}}: Fuzzy time {{value}} uses precision-encoding value (for {{precision}}), which is not allowed here
GE-INT-MIN: {{path}}: Invalid int validation config, value for `min` is not within the safe range for JS integers
GE-INT-MAX: {{path}}: Invalid int validation config, value for `max` is not within the safe range for JS integers
GE-INT-NORANGE: {{path}}: Invalid int validation config, range has no valid values
GE-INT-WMIN: {{path}}: Redundant int validation config, `min` matches the minimum allowed value
GE-INT-WMAX: {{path}}: Redundant int validation config, `max` matches the maximum allowed value
GE-INT-WONE: {{path}}: Int validation config only restricts to a single value ({{value}})
GE-INT-OUTRANGE: {{path}}: Value {{value}} out of configured bounds ({{min}} to {{max}})
GE-LIST-MIN: {{path}}: Invalid minLength, should be greater than 0
GE-LIST-MAX: {{path}}: Invalid maxLength, should be greater than 0
GE-LIST-NORANGE: {{path}}: Invalid array length range, range has no valid lengths
GE-LIST-UNIQUETYPE: {{path}}: Unsupported element type for unique list (only String, Int and Enum are supported)
GE-LIST-WMIN: {{path}}: Redundant minLength, matches the default minimum length of 0
GE-LIST-WEMPTY: {{path}}: Array length validation only allows empty arrays
GE-LIST-OUTRANGE: {{path}}: Array length {{length}} out of configured bounds ({{min}}-{{max}})
GE-LIST-DUPLICATES: {{path}}: Array is not allowed to contain duplicate entries
GE-MAP-MIN: {{path}}: Invalid minSize, should be greater than 0
GE-MAP-MAX: {{path}}: Invalid maxSize, should be greater than 0
GE-MAP-NORANGE: {{path}}: Invalid map size range, range has no valid sizes
GE-MAP-WMIN: {{path}}: Redundant minSize, matches the default minimum size of 0
GE-MAP-WEMPTY: {{path}}: Map size validation only allows empty maps
GE-MAP-KEYENUM-REF: {{path}}: Invalid map key validation config, missing enum definition for reference `{{ref}}`
GE-MAP-OUTRANGE: {{path}}: Map size {{size}} out of configured bounds ({{min}}-{{max}})
GE-MAP-KEYENUM-VALUE: {{path}}: Invalid map key `{{key}}`, not a valid value for enum `{{ref}}`
GE-OBJECT-DEFAULT-UUIDV4TYPE: {{path}}: GenerateUuidV4 default value can only be applied to UUID type
GE-OBJECT-DEFAULT-NOWDATETIMETYPE: {{path}}: NowDateTime default value can only be applied to fuzzy date time type
GE-OBJECT-DEFAULT-NOWDATETYPE: {{path}}: NowDate default value can only be applied to fuzzy date type
GE-OBJECT-DEFAULT-NOWTIMETYPE: {{path}}: NowTime default value can only be applied to fuzzy time type
GE-OBJECT-MISSINGPROP: {{path}}: Missing required property `{{prop}}` (has no default value)
GE-STRING-MIN: {{path}}: Invalid minLength, should be greater than 0
GE-STRING-MAX: {{path}}: Invalid maxLength, should be greater than 0
GE-STRING-NORANGE: {{path}}: Invalid string length range, range has no valid lengths
GE-STRING-WMIN: {{path}}: Redundant minLength, matches the default minimum length of 0
GE-STRING-WEMPTY: {{path}}: String length validation only allows empty strings
GE-STRING-OUTRANGE: {{path}}: String length {{length}} out of configured bounds ({{min}}-{{max}})
GE-UUID-FORMAT: {{path}}: Value `{{value}}` is not a UUID respecting the format {{format}}
GE-CONFIG-EXT-ROOTREF: {{path}}: Invalid root extension, object definition `{{ref}}` not found
GE-CONFIG-EXT-ROOTBASE: {{path}}: Invalid root extension, object definition `{{ref}}` must be an extension for {{expectedBaseEntity}}
GE-CONFIG-EXT-EMBEDDEDREF: {{path}}: Invalid extension for {{embeddedEntityName}}, object definition `{{ref}}` not found
GE-CONFIG-EXT-EMBEDDEDBASE: {{path}}: Invalid extension for {{embeddedEntityName}}, object definition `{{ref}}` must be an extension for {{embeddedEntityName}}
GE-CONFIG-DUPID: {{path}}: Duplicate type identifier `{{id}}` found in configuration (used {{count}} times)
GEM-EXT-REQUIRED: {{path}}: The extensions configuration changed, a migration for ({{sourceRefType}}) {{sourceRef}} -> ({{targetRefType}}) {{target}} is required.
GEM-PROV-DEFAULT: {{path}}: The configuration for this property requires to use the target entity default value but the target entity has no default value or has a non-constant default value.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-MISSING: {{path}}: The configured migration specifies to use the value of a non-existing source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}}.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-WNOTNULLABLE: {{path}}: The configured mapped null value is unused, since the source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}} is not nullable.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-NULLABLE: {{path}}: The source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}} is nullable but the target property is not; you must specify a value to use for the target when the source is nullable.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-TRANSFORM: {{path}}: The source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}} does not match the target type, you must provide an appropriate builtin value transformer or use a custom migration method.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-TRANSFORMRECOMMEND: {{path}}: The source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}} does not match the target type, you must provide an appropriate builtin value transformer (such as {{recommendation}}) or use a custom migration method.
GEM-PROV-SOURCE-APPLICABILITY: {{path}}: The requested value transformation ({{transform}}) from source property ({{sourcePropLocation}}) {{sourceProp}} is not applicable. Check other error messages for details.
GEM-ENUM-DUPLICATES: {{path}}: Duplicate enum migrations for {{source}} (builtin={{builtinSource}}) -> {{target}} (builtin={{builtinTarget}}), multiple definitions for the same source->target enum pair are not allowed.
GEM-ENUM-SOURCEREF: {{path}}: Enum definition for source reference `{{ref}}` does not exist.
GEM-ENUM-TARGETREF: {{path}}: Enum definition for target reference `{{ref}}` does not exist.
GEM-ENUM-MAPPING: {{path}}: Enum migration configuration does not define an explicit mapping for source entry `{{entry}}` and there is no applicable fallback.
GEM-ENUM-MAPPINGAUTO: {{path}}: Enum migration configuration does not define an explicit mapping for source entry `{{entry}}` and there is no applicable fallback, but could be mapped by enabling automatic mapping of entries with identical names in the target configuration.
GEM-ENUM-NULLABLE: {{path}}: Enum migration configuration is used with a non-nullable target, can't use null target value ({{mappingSource}}).
GEM-OBJECT-DUPLICATES: {{path}}: Duplicate object migrations for ({{sourceRefType}}) {{sourceRef}} -> ({{targetRefType}}) {{target}}, multiple definitions for the same source->target object pair are not allowed.
GEM-OBJECT-WUNUSEDSOURCE: {{path}}: Object migration does not use the value of the custom source property `{{prop}}` in configured builtin migrations. Unless this value is used in a custom migration function the content will be permanently lost during migration.
GEM-OBJECT-SOURCEREF: {{path}}: Object definition for source custom object reference `{{ref}}` does not exist.
GEM-OBJECT-TARGETREF: {{path}}: Object definition for target custom object reference `{{ref}}` does not exist.
GEM-OBJECT-MAPPING: {{path}}: Object migration configuration does not define a mapping for source property `{{prop}}` and there is no applicable fallback. You must define a mapping for this property.
GEM-OBJECT-MAPPINGRECOMMEND: {{path}}: Object migration configuration does not define a mapping for source property `{{prop}}` and configured fallbacks are not applicable. You must define a mapping for this property or add an appropriate fallback behavior such as {{recommendation}}.
